author: missirol
body:
#### PR description:

This PR removes the unused parameter `L1GTSeedLabel` from the plugin `HLTPixelIsolTrackL1TFilter`.

Minor technical improvements are also applied to the latter plugin.

Merely technical. No changes expected.

#### PR validation:

None.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported, please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: remove unused parameter `L1GTSeedLabel` from `HLTPixelIsolTrackL1TFilter` plugin
